Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game where players dig through procedurally generated terrain to collect resources, build structures, and interact with other players in real-time. The game features both desktop and mobile controls, a comprehensive shop system for upgrades and items, and persistent save functionality with cloud synchronization. Players can host servers, transfer admin privileges, and explore an infinite underground world filled with various ores and building materials.
